ARABIC: وَٱللَّهُ يَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah calls to the Abode of Peace and He guides whom He wills to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God invites you to mansions of peace, and guides whosoever He will to the path that is straight
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (You are being lured by this ephemeral world) although Allah calls you to the abode of peace and guides whomsoever He wills to a straightway.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God invites every one to the House of Peace and guides whomever He wants to the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Allah calls to the abode of peace, and guides whomever He wills on the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah calls to the Abode of Peace (Paradise) and guides whom He wills to the straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah invites to the abode of peace and guides whom He pleases into the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And God summons to the Abode of Peace, and He guides whomsoever He will to to a straight path;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Allah summoneth to the abode of peace, and leadeth whom He will to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God calls man to the home of peace and He guides whom He wills to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah calleth unto the abode of peace and guideth whomso ever He will to the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah invites to the abode of peace, and He guides whomever He wishes to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But Allah doth call to the Home of Peace: He doth guide whom He pleaseth to a way that is straight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah calls to the home of peace (i.e. Paradise, by accepting Allah's religion of Islamic Monotheism and by doing righteous good deeds and abstaining from polytheism and evil deeds) and guides whom He wills to a Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah invites you to the House of Peace. He guides whom He will to a Straight Path
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God invites to the Home of Peace, and guides whomever He wills to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah invites to the Home of Peace and guides whom He wills to a straight path
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:25] And God summons to the Abode of Peace, that is, [the Abode] of security, which is Paradise, by summoning [people] to faith, and He guides whomever He wills, that he be guided, to a straight path, the religion of Islam.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Allah summoneth) all created beings by means of the profession of divine Oneness (to the abode of peace) the Peace (al-Salam) is Allah and His abode is Paradise, (and leadeth whom He will to a straight path) an established religion with which He is pleased, i.e. Islam.
